game.title: Slaying the Jabberwock
game.description: The Jabberwock is a fearsome creature that has been terrorizing the countryside. It must be stopped.

task.description: The Jabberwock resides in a cave deep within the Moonlit Forest.
Be cautious; it's a fierce battle.

task.objective: Return to Queen Titania with the Jabberwock's head.
task.description: Her thanks will be immense for your assistance.
